column4: does someone know how to make the ipod touch work under ubuntu 7.10?
i have the same problem :p
at least it charges now
yeh, that works fine over here too. i think it is possible to load songs on it. but not videos
btw, i jailbreaked mine today
also got mail and stuff to work?
calendar doesnt let me add items though
go to the isntaller, and go to the end of the list. there should be a calendar option to be installed
after that you are able to click on the plus and add items to the calendar
ok, i'll try, so far i copied a Nsomething lst file
do you also have a decent free space problem in the root partition?
in linux? or you mean on ipod ?
on the ipod
i have 11Mb left
well the space reserved for installing applications is not big. the applications themselves are not so big eitehr so thats ok
yes, but i get the warnings... and i fear next 11MB mail will kill it :-)
and uninstalling doesnt help unfortunately
im not sure if attachments are saved on the device
if you find how to mount the touch under gutsy, would you drop me a note?
sure. im gonna sleep now though but will be back later
just pmsg me if you know something, i'll do the same
